root: ^“Alright rookie, our next assignment is the building on 813 Oatley St. We go there next week, I want to make sure you know what you’re doing ahead of time and are prepared, this could be a tough case.
^“I promise I won’t let you down. What do you want me to do?"

^“Throughout this investigation you'll be using tools like the a EMF, spirit box, salt and UV light. But the most important thing is to keep your wits throughout investigation. Descion making is very crucial in this line of work.
^If you make bad call you could get seriously hurt or potientally die. Have a go at."
^"What came first the chicken or the egg?"

chicken: ^"Not exactly. Technically if you really think about it was an egg because it whatever laid the egg of the first chicken probably wasn't a chicken at all or something."
egg: ^"Yeah cuz if you think about it whatever laid the egg of the first chicken probably wasn't a chicken at all or something.
idk: ^"Very indecisive now are we huh? Not an ideal trait to have when getting confronted by a spirit. C'mon just pick an option!
final: ^"The answers can be debatable for that one but hey I'm a paranormal investigator not a philsopher. Anywho I think you’ll do fine out there. We definitely have been needing someone like you on our team. Just make sure you keep your eyes peeled during that investigation. See you next week."
^“Sounds pretty dangerous but I'm sure I'll do fine."
^“Thank you for the opportunity, see you next week.”
